answers.answer: Babies sometimes measure ahead, or not. Do you have gestational diabetes? Babies are known to be bigger if you have that, they may have your due date wrong, fluid might be a little more so today, you never know. Did your doctor seem concerned? Are you scheduled for an U/S?
she will scheduele me for u/s in 2 weeks when i will be 32. doctor didnt seem concern but im just curious would the baby come early? was my due date wrong?

It might be, or the baby might just be measuring ahead, in that case the baby may come early, or they may induce early to make sure the baby doesn't get too big, but your next appt. you might be measuring right on track, they just grow at different rates!
U might be carrying high I did that y I measured ahead till my son dropped then I measured right
i feel like im carrying high that could just be it...thanks for the feedback
thanks ill have to wait until that u/s hopefuly everything will be normal by then.

question: im 29 weeks pregnant but today at my doctors visit i measured 34 im confused as to why i measured that when the doc said all my measurements have been on point
title: pregnancy and measurements
